MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-NOV-2020 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH43 area of Walkerburn, affecting properties in Caberston Avenue. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am due to repairs required to our underground electricity network on Caberston Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:03am on Monday, 09 November 2020
